messaging.title: Messages
messaging.start_conversation: Start a new conversation to begin messaging

messaging.getting_started_text: To see real conversations here, you'll need to:
messaging.instruction_1: Click "New Chat" to start a conversation
messaging.instruction_2: Select contacts who have accepted relationship connections
messaging.note_text: You can only message users with whom you have an accepted relationship connection.
messaging.choose_chat: Choose a chat from the list to start messaging
messaging.need_connections: You need to have accepted connections to start a chat
messaging.private_conversation: This is a private conversation. To add more people, create a group chat
messaging.no_blocked_users_yet: You haven't blocked any users yet.
messaging.unblock_info: Unblocking a user will allow them to message you again and see your public content.
messaging.valid_email_required: Please enter a valid email address.
messaging.valid_url_required: Please enter a valid URL including http:// or https://
messaging.question_validation: Question is required and must be less than 500 characters.
messaging.answer_validation: Answer is required and must be less than 2000 characters.
messaging.valid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number in format +#### (###)
messaging.valid_city: Please enter a valid city name
messaging.valid_zipcode: Please enter a valid zip code

errors.auth_email_already_in_use_message: The email address is already in use by another account. Please use a different email.

errors.auth_account_exists_with_different_crede: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Please sign in using a provider associated with this email address.

errors.auth_provider_already_linked_message: This account is already linked to another provider.

errors.auth_missing_uid_message: A UID identifier is required for the current operation.

errors.auth_invalid_session_cookie_duration_mes: The session cookie duration must be a valid number in milliseconds between 5 minutes and 2 weeks.

errors.auth_custom_token_mismatch_message: The custom token corresponds to a different Firebase project.

errors.auth_null_user_message: A null user object was provided as the argument for an operation which requires a non-null user object.
errors.auth_app_deleted_message: This instance of FirebaseApp has been deleted.

errors.auth_missing_client_identifier_message: The request is missing a client identifier.

errors.auth_maximum_second_factor_count_exceede: The maximum allowed number of second factors on a user has been exceeded.
errors.auth_unsupported_first_factor_message: Enrolling a second factor or signing in with a multi-factor account requires sign-in with a supported first factor.
errors.auth_email_change_needs_verification_mes: Multi-factor users must always have a verified email.
